name: Foodie Hub
detail: ● A full-stack restaurant web application with category-wise menus, live search, cart system, and admin panel. Built using React.js (frontend), Node.js & Express.js (backend), Firebase (authentication), and MongoDB (database). Features include WhatsApp-based order delivery and customer support, localStorage-based cart caching, and role-based admin access. Hosted on Netlify (frontend) and Render (backend)

name: Employee Promotion Prediction
techStack: ReactJS, NodeJS, Firebase, Flask, Machine Learning
detail: ● This project predicts employee promotions using machine learning. It utilizes the Random Forest algorithm to analyze a dataset of 78,000 records, including attributes like department, education, experience, and performance metrics. The model improves decision-making by helping HR teams identify potential candidates for promotion. Accuracy is used as the evaluation metric, and necessary adjustments were made to reduce bias and improve generalization. This project demonstrates the practical application of machine learning in HR analytics.

name: Bistro Boss Restaurant
detail: ● A responsive restaurant application developed using React, JavaScript, MongoDB, Node.js, and Express.js, designed to manage restaurant operations efficiently..
